skill.name: seo-leak
skill.description: SEO intelligence engine for competitive analysis. Estimates Q*, P*, and T* signals, analyzes NavBoost and E-E-A-T factors, identifies ranking gaps, orchestrates audit workflows, and provides actionable SEO strategy recommendations.
skill.summary: SEO intelligence engine for competitive analysis. Estimates Q*, P*, and T* signals, analyzes NavBoos...
skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill contained in markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or external commands. Contains only SEO analysis frameworks and methodology.

content.value_statement: Understand why competitors outrank you by analyzing Google's Q*, P*, and T* signals. Get actionable recommendations to close ranking gaps and build authority.
actual_capabilities: Estimates Google ranking signals (Q*, P*, T*) for target keywords
Analyzes NavBoost user behavior signals (CTR, dwell time, pogo-sticking)
Identifies ranking gaps between your site and top competitors
Orchestrates comprehensive SEO audits across technical and content areas
Provides prioritized SEO strategy recommendations with timelines
limitations: Does not provide real-time ranking data (requires external API integration)
Cannot access live backlink databases or perform automated link building
Does not generate AI content for SEO optimization
Analysis quality depends on input accuracy and context provided

use_cases.title: Competitor ranking analysis
use_cases.description: Understand why competitors rank higher and discover actionable gaps to close

use_cases.title: Comprehensive site audits
use_cases.description: Run full technical, content, and authority audits with prioritized action plans

use_cases.title: Keyword strategy decisions
use_cases.description: Evaluate keyword difficulty and determine if targeting a keyword is worth the effort

prompt_templates.title: Basic signal analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze ranking signals for [keyword]. Who currently ranks in top 3? Estimate Q*, P*, and T* scores. What gaps exist for a new entrant?

prompt_templates.title: Competitor comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare my page [your URL] against [competitor URL 1] and [competitor URL 2] for [keyword]. Identify P*, T*, and NavBoost gaps with specific recommendations.

prompt_templates.title: Full SEO audit
prompt_templates.scenario: Run comprehensive audit on a site
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a comprehensive SEO audit for [site URL]. Cover technical, content, and authority factors. Rank issues by impact and provide a 90-day action plan.

prompt_templates.title: Strategic roadmap
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an SEO strategy roadmap for [site] targeting [list keywords]. Current position: [ranking or not ranked]. Timeline: [90 days / 6 months / 12 months]. Include authority building and content recommendations.

output_examples.input: Analyze why competitor ranks #1 for 'best project management software for startups'
output: Q* Signal: Commercial intent with strong brand recognition needed
P* Strength: 4,200 words, 12 sections, 24 images, 2 videos, updated monthly
T* Authority: 45k backlinks, 15-year domain, media mentions
NavBoost: High CTR from compelling title, strong dwell time from video content
Your Gap Score: 78/100 - You need 18-24 months to compete directly
Recommended Strategy: Target long-tail variations first, build authority through PR

best_practices: Provide specific URLs and exact keywords for accurate analysis
Include competitor URLs so Claude can compare content depth and structure
Set clear timeline expectations (90 days, 6 months, 12 months) for strategy alignment
Update analysis context when your site changes or competitors update content
anti_patterns: Asging for rankings without providing competitor URLs for comparison
Skipping the timeline context leads to generic recommendations
Expecting real-time data without integrating DataForSEO or similar APIs
Using for content generation - this skill analyzes, it does not create content

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Best results with Claude Opus for extended analysis.

faq.question: How accurate are the Q*, P*, T* estimates?
faq.answer: Estimates are based on SEO principles and observable patterns. They guide strategy, not predict exact rankings.

faq.question: Does this integrate with SEO tools?
faq.answer: Designed to work alongside DataForSEO, SEMRush, and Google Search Console APIs for real data.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill uses only prompts and methodology. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why isn't my page ranking despite good content?
faq.answer: Analysis will identify gaps in E-E-A-T, authority, technical factors, or NavBoost signals that content alone cannot fix.

faq.question: How is this different from other SEO tools?
faq.answer: Focuses on understanding why rankings happen through signal analysis, not just tracking rankings. Provides strategic recommendations based on competitive intelligence.
